```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Load the data
defaultW <- getOption("warn") #turn off the warnings
options(warn = -1) #turn off all warnings
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(astsa)
library(scales)
ridership <- read_csv("trips_data_by_day.csv", 
                      col_names = c(
                        "trip_day",
                        "trip_count",
                        "mean_trip_length",
                        "trip_hours",
                        "city"
                      ),
                      col_types=cols(
                        trip_day = col_date(),
                        trip_count = col_integer(),
                        mean_trip_length = col_double(),
                        trip_hours = col_double(),
                        city = col_character()
                      ))
```

```{r}
nyc_ridership <- ridership %>% filter(city == "NYC")
nyc_ridership$ridership_average_7 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$trip_count, sides=2, filter=rep(1/7,7))
nyc_ridership$ridership_average_31 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$trip_count, sides=2, filter=rep(1/31,31))
nyc_ridership$trip_length_moving_average_7 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$mean_trip_length, sides=2, filter=rep(1/7,7))
nyc_ridership$trip_length_moving_average_31 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$mean_trip_length, sides=2, filter=rep(1/31,31))
nyc_ridership$trip_hours_moving_average_7 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$trip_hours, sides=2, filter=rep(1/7,7))
nyc_ridership$trip_hours_moving_average_31 <- stats::filter(nyc_ridership$trip_hours, sides=2, filter=rep(1/31,31))

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = nyc_ridership, mapping=aes(x=trip_day)) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(y=trip_count), color = "orange") +
  geom_line(mapping =aes(y=ridership_average_31), color= "blue") +
  ggtitle("NYC Daily Citibike Trip Counts with 31 Day Moving Average") +
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5, color = "white"),
        axis.title = element_blank()
  )
```

```{r}

y=log(nyc_ridership$trip_count)  #y = log transformation
n=length(y)
#difference
dy = y[2:n] - y[1:(n-1)] #y[t] - y[t-1]
dy = c(0,dy)
#plot(x=1:n, y=dy)

ggplot(data = nyc_ridership, mapping=aes(x=trip_day)) +
  #geom_line(mapping = aes(y=trip_hours), color = "orange") +
  geom_line(mapping=aes(y=dy), color= "blue") +
  ggtitle("NYC Daily Citibike Total Trip Counts with Diff'ed 1-day") +
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5),
        axis.title = element_blank())

```

```{r}
a = acf(y)
da = acf(dy)
#pa=pacf(y)
#pady=pacf(dy)

#ggplot that shows both acf(y) and acf(dy)
ggplot(data = NULL, mapping=aes(x=a$lag)) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(y=da$acf), color = "orange") +
  geom_line(mapping =aes(y=a$acf), color= "blue") +
  ggtitle("ACF of NYC Daily Citibike Total Trip") +
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5),
        axis.title = element_blank())

#positive correlated intervals every 7 lags = seasonality


```
